title: Joint Tenants
description: alternate cover for B00JGI5NEKWhen two people cannot agree on what love means, not all goes as planned. 'Curvy girl' Jasmine Winslow is madly in love with Wade Montgomery. But he has one obstacle. He cannot utter those three little words she longs to hear. I love you! Furthermore, becoming joint tenants in a home was not developing into the commitment she anticipated.
author: Deborah McClatchey
